name: Donut Special
description:
Made in 3 hours for Trijam 87

Lay as much rubber as possible in the time provided.  The more powerslides, donuts, and j-turns you make the better.

  • Steer with [W],[A],[S],[D] or the arrow-keys
  • Apply the handbrake with [Space]

Tire squeal sound: https://freesound.org/people/audible-edge/sounds/71739/
Engine sound: https://freesound.org/people/modman34/sounds/512558/
